reviews.review_msg: Very good prof. His examples are good and he always explains everything. The tests are easy, I think our second midterm was high B or even low A average. He's pretty funny too.

Good Teacher, a little dull tries to be funny, very nice guy, would take again for future calc classes. Quiz every Friday, Calculus Hw every week, there are online questions plus paper questions. 2 questions on the quiz, and you get 10 minutes; sometimes these are difficult. Also two midterms, first midterm is typically 3 weeks after class starts
